title: Line of balance
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures, Peter Bradford and Walter Storey
brief_description: Line of balance is a programming technique developed by production engineers to plan and control manufacturing processes in factories. Illustrates adaption for use on building sites. Uses animation to explain the basic principles of the techniques, and shows use of the management disciplines of mass production.
